blogPost.excerpt: Pizazz helps you engage viewers and capture attention during video meetings in three simple steps - select a background, upload your slides and voila! Pizazz is FREE for the launch!
blogPost.body: Pizazz helps you engage viewers and capture attention during video meetings in three simple steps - select a background, upload your slides and voila! Pizazz is FREE for the launch!
blogPost.title: Pizazz - Virtual presentations for Zoom
blogPost.author: Ido Lavi

localize.description: Pizazz通过三个简单的步骤帮助您在视频会议期间吸引观众并吸引注意力-选择背景、上传幻灯片和瞧！PIZAZS的发布是免费的！
localize.tagline: 用于缩放的虚拟演示文稿

localize.description: Pizazz通過三個簡單的步驟幫助您在視頻會議期間吸引觀衆並吸引注意力-選擇背景、上傳幻燈片和瞧！PIZAZS的發佈是免費的！
localize.tagline: 用於縮放的虛擬演示文稿

previous.excerpt: Think you've got a great taste in music? Are you down with the latest trends? Consider yourself a bit of music connoisseur, ey!?..Well, let's see what this AI thinks about that! 🤖
previous.title: How Bad Is Your Spotify? - A sophistacted A.I. judges your awful taste in music.

localize.description: 你觉得你对音乐很有品味吗？你了解最新的流行趋势吗？认为自己是一个音乐鉴赏家，嗯！？..那么，让我们看看这个AI对此有什么想法！🤖
localize.tagline: 一个装腔作势的人工智能会评判你糟糕的音乐品味。

localize.description: 你覺得你對音樂很有品味嗎？你瞭解最新的流行趨勢嗎？認爲自己是一個音樂鑑賞家，嗯！？..那麼，讓我們看看這個AI對此有什麼想法！🤖
localize.tagline: 一個裝腔作勢的人工智能會評判你糟糕的音樂品味。
